Kikongo: Fu kya kula,  fu kya lundumuna
fuka dya zyelo, fuka dya nsyenge
sanga kya ntoto vandambu a maza
nkaka a se, nkaka a ngudi
kipombo,  Muntu kansanswa ko,  Butu,  Zowa,  Zengi
su kya fomo, kinzu kya fomo
nkada wa tadila lumbu ya ngonde
kuluzu dya nene, kuluzu dya tadi
yawu ye yawu , bawu ye bawu
yeto ye yeto, beto ye beto
yeno ye yeno, beno ye beno
fulu kya lozila nsengo ya nkulu
